login.title: Schedule online appointments with professionals from your employee assistance program!
login.subtitle: Log in to start

errors.notActive: User not active, please check your email to activate your account

errors.under18: You must be over 18 years old

pdp.label: I confirm that I agree to share my data for this and future communications from the assistance program. It is important that you review the detailed information in our data protection policy at www.eaplatina.com. Your agreement is necessary to receive our services. If you decide to provide the mentioned data, you will be giving your informed consent for EAP Latina Corporation S.A. to process and record it. To request changes to your data or revoke your consent, contact us at protecciondedatospersonales@eaplatina.com.

errors.required: You must accept the terms and conditions

dataVeracity.label: I declare that the data provided is true

errors.required: You must declare that the data provided is true

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.text:
On this platform, you will find a wide selection of professionals who will help you enhance your overall well-being.



Schedule your appointments with mental, physical, legal, and financial health professionals 100% online.

validateAccount.title: Last step!
validateAccount.message: You will soon receive a registration email to validate your account. Once validated, you can access the platform using your personal account and schedule an appointment with a professional in our agenda.

platform.title: Review your pending appointments and schedule new ones

appointmentList.reviewAndSchedule: Review your pending appointments and schedule new ones
appointmentList.emptyTitle: You don't have any pending appointments
appointmentList.emptySubtitle: Click on the button below to schedule your online appointment

deleteAppointment.title: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
deleteAppointment.subtitle: You appointment will be cancelled and you won't be able to undo this action
deleteAppointment.lessThan24Hours: You can't cancel an appointment less than 24 hours before the scheduled time
deleteAppointment.lessThan24HoursSubtitle: To cancel or reschedule this appointment, please contact us with one of the options shown in the Help section

notification.title: Your appointment with {professionalName} has been successfully canceled
notification.description: Your appointment on {date} at {time} has been canceled

createAppointment.activeCaseError: You already have an active case, please contact our help line if you need to make a change
createAppointment.mustSelectAssistanceType: You must select a type of assistance
createAppointment.appointmentCreationError: Error creating the appointment, please select all necessary data
createAppointment.appointmentNotificationTitle: Your appointment with {professionalName} has been successfully scheduled!
createAppointment.appointmentNotificationDescription: Your appointment has been scheduled for {date} at {time}
createAppointment.noAvailableAppointments: There are no appointments available for the selected filters
createAppointment.selectADate: Select a date to see available appointments
createAppointment.selectATime: Select a time to see available professionals
createAppointment.noAvailableProfessionals: There are no professionals available for the selected filters

confirmationDialog.title: Are you sure you want to schedule this appointment?

appointmentCreatedDialog.title: Appointment scheduled successfully
appointmentCreatedDialog.description: You have a scheduled appointment for {date} from {timeFrom} to {timeTo} with {professionalName}
appointmentCreatedDialog.emailConfirmation: You will receive an email confirmation shortly

phonecall.terms: The professional will be calling the number you have provided at the scheduled time. Remember that the call may come from a private number. If it has been +10 minutes past the scheduled time or you have missed calls, please contact us so we can put you in touch with the assigned professional.

videocall.terms1stPart: It will be necessary for you to carefully read our informed consent with all the information about the terms and conditions associated with the type of consultation and modality:
videocall.termsLink: Click here to know terms and conditions
videocall.terms2ndPart: We understand that by connecting to the next appointment you voluntarily accept the terms and conditions of our documents. It is important that at the time of the consultation you can be in a private, comfortable place with a good connection to guarantee professional guidance.
videocall.knowMore: If you want to know more about our Privacy Policy and data processing you can click here: <privacyNotice>Privacy Policy</privacyNotice>

pdpConfirmationDialog.notSignedOrExpired: You have not signed the data protection authorization or it has expired
pdpConfirmationDialog.importantReview: It is important that you review the detailed information in our data protection policy at www.eaplatina.com. Your agreement is necessary to receive our services. If you decide to provide the mentioned data, you will be giving your informed consent for EAP Latina Corporation S.A. to process and record it. To request changes to your data or revoke your consent, contact us at protecciondedatospersonales@eaplatina.com.
